SELECT `TABLE_SCHEMA` , TABLE_NAME , COALESCE ( `TABLE_ROWS` , ? ) AS `TABLE_ROWS` , COALESCE ( AVG_ROW_LENGTH , ? ) AS AVG_ROW_LENGTH , COALESCE ( `DATA_LENGTH` , ? ) AS `DATA_LENGTH` , COALESCE ( `INDEX_LENGTH` , ? ) AS `INDEX_LENGTH` FROM `information_schema` . `TABLES` WHERE `TABLE_SCHEMA` NOT IN (...)	d08f3a4d7e1be08b1fe479a1f9c7f56fc480b7b60c365cb330c65acd35ab1c42	1	[null]	0.000002	419	0.001828125	0.00182925	154	194113649536000
